about_the_game:
Burger Night is a comedy horror game, in which your only job is to collect items, explore, clean corpses and run from the god damn burger. And if you make it out alive, well you wont.

This game takes everything non-fictional and throws it out the window, Burger Night is a horror/thriller game (despite it not being that scary) that is about a Burger that is chasing you while you try to clean corpses and collect.. hotdog pieces? Well that's besides the point, if you looking for a laugh and a cheap and quick play, Burger Night is definitely for you!

name: Burger Night

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: DISK SPACE IS AN ESTIMATE
